abstract: Minsun Kim, after year of infighting, lawsuits and vitriol, is named 34th president of Korean American Assn of Greater New York.
lead_paragraph: After a year of bitter battles between factions in the Korean American Association of Greater New York, Minsun Kim was welcomed as the organization’s 34th president.

headline.main: After Lawsuits, a Break-In and an Attempted Coup, a New York Korean Group Has a New President
headline.print_headline: After Bitter Battle, Korean Group Has New Leader

snippet: After a year of bitter battles between factions in the Korean American Association of Greater New York, Minsun Kim was welcomed as the organization’s 34th president.

keywords.value: Korean-American Assn of Greater New York
